authentication.title: Tem Açúcar - Authentication
authentication.description: An authentication represents an individual signed in to use the Tem Açúcar app

links.description: Sign in with a new authentication.
links.title: Create

links.description: Sign out from an existing authentication.
links.title: Delete

demand.title: Tem Açúcar - Demand
demand.description: A demand represents something a user asks to the neighborhood

radius.description: radius of the demand in kilometers

distance.description: distant from current user of the demand in kilometers

limit.description: maximum of results to be returned when listing demands, '10' if not informed

offset.description: offset (starting point) to be used when listing demands, '0' if not informed

filter.description: type of filter to be used when listing demands, 'neighborhood' if not informed

error.title: Tem Açúcar - Error
error.description: An error represents a failed action in Tem Açúcar API

flag.title: Tem Açúcar - Flag
flag.description: A flag represents the act of an user reporting a demand as inappropriate

me.title: Tem Açúcar - Me
me.description: Me represents the individual signed in to use the Tem Açúcar app

message.title: Tem Açúcar - Message
message.description: A message is a communication between users about a transaction

limit.description: maximum of results to be returned when listing demands, '10' if not informed

offset.description: offset (starting point) to be used when listing demands, '0' if not informed

notification.title: Tem Açúcar - Notification
notification.description: A notification represents some change in the context of a user that should be notified

triggering_user.description: user whose action triggered the notification

triggering_user_id.description: unique identifier of user whose action triggered the notification

read.description: wheter or not user has read the notification

admin.description: wheter or not the notification is about admin issues

limit.description: maximum of results to be returned when listing demands, '10' if not informed; only used for read filter

offset.description: offset (starting point) to be used when listing demands, '0' if not informed; only used for read filter

filter.description: type of filter to be used when listing notifications, 'read' if not informed

links.description: Update all unread notifications to read.
links.title: Read all

password.title: Tem Açúcar - Password
password.description: A password represents an users's attempt to reset her password on the Tem Açúcar app

links.description: Request token to create a new password to be sent to user's email.
links.title: Request token

links.description: Reset user password through token set to user's email.
links.title: Reset password

refusal.title: Tem Açúcar - Refusal
refusal.description: A refusal represents the act of an user refusing a demand

review.title: Tem Açúcar - Review
review.description: A review represents the rating and description of the experience a user gives to a transaction

user.description: user being reviewed by the reviewer

reviewer_id.description: unique identifier of user whose action triggered the review

limit.description: maximum of results to be returned when listing demands, '10' if not informed; only used for read filter

offset.description: offset (starting point) to be used when listing demands, '0' if not informed; only used for read filter

transaction.title: Tem Açúcar - Transaction
transaction.description: A transaction is the group of messages from a user to the user of a demand

last_message_text.description: text of the last message of the transaction

can_review_ids.description: ids of users who currently can review the transaction

user.title: Tem Açúcar - User
user.description: An user represents an individual signed up to use the Tem Açúcar app

password.description: unencrypted password of user, used only on user creation

distance.description: distant from current user of the demand in kilometers

address_sub_administrative_area.description: address sub administrative area of user

image_url.description: image url of user calculated from uploaded_image_url, facebook_image_url or gravatar

accepted_terms.description: wheter or not user has accepted Tem Açúcar terms of use

reviewed_email.description: wheter or not user has reviewed her primary email address

reviewed_location.description: wheter or not user has reviewed her address

admin.description: wheter or not user can administrate the whole Tem Açúcar app

gcm_token.description: GCM token for identifying the device on Google Cloud Messages

facebook_token.description: Facebook token for connecting user to Facebook

neighbors_count.description: The total of neighbors 1km from the user

neighbors_image_url.description: Image URL for map representing the user's neighbors

links.description: Connect an existing user to Facebook
links.title: Update

version.title: Tem Açúcar - Version
version.description: An user represents a version of the Tem Açúcar app for a platform

number.description: unique number of version for its platform

description: The API for Tem Açúcar, an app to borrow things from neighbors.
title: Tem Açúcar API
